name: Evasion (itch)
description:
Evasion is a variation on Chinese Checkers designed to focus on fast-paced, asymmetric play. Use different combinations of abilities to escort your white piece to the other side and capture your opponent's pieces!

Local multiplayer for 2 players.

Game by Ethan Caraway

Music by Ryan Travis

Adapted from a board game designed by Jesse Clifton, Eli Cohen, and James Krause

Like Evasion on Facebook to stay informed on all the news and updates on the game.
